original_text: They also brought the special clothes for Aaron and his sons to wear when they served the Lord as priests in the Holy Place.
korean_text: 성소에서 섬기기 위한 정교한 옷 곧 제사 직분을 행할 때에 입는 제사장 아론의 거룩한 옷과 그의 아들들의 옷이라

sentences.original_text: They also brought the special clothes
to wear when they served the Lord
as priests in the Holy Place
